text: late yesterday afternoon the Leviathan
to made a mayday call caught on camera
by this passerby 27 people were on board
as the boat started sinking it was just
off the coast of British Columbia in
Western Canada near to Vancouver Island
conditions were said to be calm and
sunny a search-and-rescue operation
began but five people were pronounced
dead and one person is still missing 21
others were taken to a local hospital
three have since been transferred
elsewhere the 20-metre boat was operated
by jamies whaling station they've
released a statement saying it has been
a tragic day our entire team is
heartbroken over this incident we are
doing everything we can to assist our
passengers and staff through this
difficult time the area is a popular
destination for whale watchers wanting
to spot humpback and Pacific gray whales
it's not yet clear who the victims are
or white the boat sank but a full
investigation is underway Frankie
McKinley BBC News
